Hi, Litmus

29 Jan 2014

My name is Greg

I came across this job posting on the WeWorkRemotely.com job board. I love effective software, passionate companies, and solving problems.

After reading Justine's testimonial and watching the behind the scenes video, I knew right away that I had to apply for this job.

Litmus is a company that is dedicated to doing things the right way. They are at the forefront of the email marketing world, ahead of the curve on accessibility and analytics.

From my perspective, it's clear that email marketing is going to go through some drastic changes over the coming years. Working for a company that is ready for this challenge sounds like an amazing opportunity.

How I think I can help

In the recent past I've:

  • Helped a client setup an email auto-responder (I used Aweber, sorry!)
  • Co-wrote a marketing handbook used for lead generation (I used Mailchimp, sorry again!)
  • Received my MBA from Antioch University New England
  • Developed a promotional video for a new company
  • Learned face-to-face customer service skills while working in restaurants through college and graduate school
  • Started a blog on my Ruby learning journey

Throughout all of my professional experiences, one thing has remained a constant: customers love getting wow'ed! Regardless of the industry I have worked in, I can proudly say that my customer's experiences have come first.

I take the words of Zig Ziglar to heart: "You can have everything in life you want, if you will just help enough other people get what they want."

One of my previous employers had this to say about me:

Greg kicks ass. He possesses a fantastic balance of creativity and business savvy that can be employed across a range of work. He worked tirelessly in nearly a year with me I never heard him complain... He is a fantastic communicator equally adept at listening as sharing ideas. And he can juggle projects like nobody making long, hectic days much more bearable.
— Heath Korvola

tl;dr I'm a tech-savvy MBA that dabbles with code and learned the importance of wow'ing customers at a young age. I believe I would excel at this position and help Litmus grow.

Why I want to work for Litmus

Litmus strikes me as a truly unique organization.

The thought of working with a team that has a high level of cohesiveness sounds like a dream come true. Along with that, the progressive nature of the software industry (SaaS in particular) makes me jump for joy inside. Litmus seems like an organization committed to non-stop learning and opportunity. I plan on working within the software industry for a long time and this seems like a golden opportunity.

Contact

I look forward to hearing from you! If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.
